name: skeal
description:
moon pierces snowfall

boots crunch; a familiar path

last dance on the grey

As seen on Rock, Paper, Shotgun! Twice, even!

Morally opposed to downloading files? Introducing: skeal for web browsers

"playing Skeal is now a Christmas tradition"

— Alice O'Connor, Rock, Paper, Shotgun

  • WASD/arrow keys: move
  • space: jump (not super important)
  • mouse: look
  • right-click: zoom
    • *headphones are recommended*
